title: DurationPicker
description: Duration Picker allows the users to specify a duration by selecting a start time and an end time.

FormatRule.description: If specified, the given rule executes when control is initialized or value changes.

HelperText.description: Helper text to be displayed if there is no validation view.

IsVisible.description: Sets the visibility of the control.

Separator.description: Sets the visibility of the separator line below the control. This property will take precedence over `ControlSeparator` in section and is only supported for Form Cell control in Sectioned Table and not supported in Form Cell Container.

Unit.description: Unit of duration. It can be hour or minute.

MinuteInterval.description: Picker interval in minutes. The initial state of DurationPicker `MinuteInterval` is 1 min, 0 min and 00 min for iOS, Android and web respectively.

OnValueChange.description: Action or rule to perform after value changed.

Value.description: Duration value in hours or minutes depending on the unit.

validationProperties.description: Deprecated. Please use `Validation` property. The validation view properties.

Background.description: The string value is a style class name of `Background`.

Value.description: The string value is a style class name of `Value`.

Caption.description: The string value is a style class name of `Caption`.

RequiredIndicator.description: The string value is a style class name of `RequiredIndicator`.

Specifies whether a field is mandatory by displaying a visual indicator. This property accepts either a Boolean (true / false) or a single character (e.g., '!') as its value.

By default, the indicator is a red asterisk (*) displayed at the end of the field's caption. You can customize the indicator character by setting this property. Additionally, the appearance (e.g., color or size) can be styled through metadata as well.

Note:

- This indicator is **purely visual**â€”it does **not** enforce that the user must fill out the field.
- If more than one character is defined, the system will revert to using the default indicator.
